prompt_template.description: Extract entities from CoNLL-U dependency tree
prompt_template.system: You are a named entity recognition NLP parser
prompt_template.human:
Task: Given a CoNLL-U table, output all {labels}-like entities.

Output only surface forms, no extra text.
Merge consecutive tokens into the longest possible span.
Strip away leading degree/modifier adjectives (e.g., massive, high, first).
Drop measurement/container/compound words such as "level", "serum", "compounds" when they enclose the {labels}; keep only the core {labels} name.
Exclude spans that merely combine an anatomical site with a non-specific noun like “involvement”, “function”, “enzyme” — these are not {labels}.
For conjunction (DEPREL=conj) structures: list the conj head as a separate entity.
If nothing fits, return nothing.
CoNLL-U:{tree}
Output JSON format:
{{ "label1": [...] ,"label2": [...] ,...}}
